entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
